comments: There seems to be some confusion over Bove's date of birth. See L.J. Dorr, Plant Collectors in Madagascar and the Comoro Islands: 62-63 (1997)
examples: Alnus longifolia Bové ex Decne., Ann. Sci. Nat., Bot. sér. 2, 4: 348 (1835)
source: Biography in: Bull. Soc. Roy. Bot. Belgique 8: 202-206. 1869 (via Lotte Burkhardt; B)
